list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey; not salty, sour, or bitter.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a cup of hot sweet tea
it was the sweet life he had always craved
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là cuộc sống ngọt ngào mà anh luôn khao khát

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or action) pleasant and kind or thoughtful.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a very sweet nurse came along
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một y tá rất ngọt ngào đã đi cùng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used for emphasis in various phrases and exclamations.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người Mỹ ăn quá nhiều đồ ngọt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used as an affectionate form of address.
the sweet part or element of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you have had the bitter, now comes the sweet
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn đã có vị đắng, bây giờ đến ngọt ngào
